targets.expr: sum by (container) (kube_pod_container_status_ready{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"datastories.*"})
kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"datastories.*"}
sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) * 1000
kube_pod_container_resource_requests{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="cpu"} * 1000
kube_pod_container_resource_limits{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="cpu"} * 1000
container_memory_usage_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container"} / 1024 / 1024
kube_pod_container_resource_requests{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="memory"} / 1024 / 1024
kube_pod_container_resource_limits{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", resource="memory"} / 1024 / 1024
sum by (agent) (ataccama_datastories_agent_flows_in_progress{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"})
sum by (state) (ataccama_datastories_dask_scheduler_workers{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"})
ataccama_datastories_dask_scheduler_tasks{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}
sum by (agent) (ataccama_datastories_agent_total_process_memory{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) / 1024 / 1024
sum by (instance) (ataccama_datastories_dask_scheduler_clients{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"})
sum by(job, instance) (rate(ataccama_datastories_platform_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])) * 60
sum by(method, path_template) (rate(ataccama_datastories_platform_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])) * 60

panels.title: Number of HTTP requests per minute

panels.description: Decay time 1 hour. Accuracy depends on the specified buckets.

targets.expr: (histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(ataccama_datastories_platform_requests_processing_time_seconds_bucket{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[1h])) by (le, path_template, method)) > 0) * 1000

panels.title: Slowest HTTP requests 95 quantiles

panels.description: Each column represents distribution aggregated over the last hour.
panels.title: Request duration distribution over time

targets.expr:
(
    sum by (data_source) (
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_query_builder_sql_execution_time_sum{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
        /
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_query_builder_sql_execution_time_count{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) >= 0
) * 1000

panels.title: Average SQL query duration over time

panels.description: Each column represents distribution aggregated over the last hour.
panels.title: Query duration distribution over time

targets.expr:
(
    sum by (operation_name) (
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_gql_client_query_execution_time_sum{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
        /
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_gql_client_query_execution_time_count{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) >= 0
) * 1000

panels.title: Average graphQL client query duration over time

panels.description: Each column represents distribution aggregated over the last hour.
panels.title: Request duration distribution over time

targets.expr:
(
    sum by (service_name, method_name) (
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_grpc_client_query_execution_time_sum{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
        /
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_grpc_client_query_execution_time_count{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) >= 0
) * 1000

panels.title: Average GRPC client query duration over time

panels.description: Each column represents distribution aggregated over the last hour.
panels.title: Request duration distribution over time

targets.expr:
(
    sum by (operation_name) (
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_dmm_client_query_execution_time_sum{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
        /
        increase(ataccama_datastories_platform_dmm_client_query_execution_time_count{clusterName=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job="$be_job"}[$__rate_interval])
    ) >= 0
) * 1000
